easy.q: I am round and jumpy; I bounce when you kick me. What am I?
easy.hint: You play with me in sports.

medium.q: What word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?

hard.q: A city has streets in a grid. A mouse starts at the top-left and wants to reach the bottom-right by moving only right or down. How many distinct paths can it take on a 2x3 grid?
hard.hint: Use combinations: choose where to move down.
